name: Mimrr
description: Mimrr is an AI Agent for product development teams that ensures they never miss deadlines by  automating low-level tasks like codebase documentation, writing tickets, unit tests, PR reviews, and ticket backlog resolution.
one_liner: Mimrr is an AI Agent for product development teams that ensures they never miss deadlines by  automating low-level tasks like codebase documentation, writing tickets, unit tests, PR reviews, and ticket backlog resolution.
